data.comment: The match is underway at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 1, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Cerezo.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 3, Yudai Yamamoto signals a Sendai throw-in in Cerezo's half.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 7, Yudai Yamamoto awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
In the minute 10, Yudai Yamamoto awards Cerezo a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
In the minute 14, Takuma Nishimura (Sendai) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Cerezo are whistled for offside.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Hiroshi Kiyotake.
In the minute 19, Tatsuhiro Sakamoto with an assist there.
Sendai's Takumi Mase gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Cerezo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
Throw-in Sendai.
In the minute 26, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Sendai drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 30, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
Free kick Cerezo.
In the minute 34, Cerezo drives forward and Tatsuhiro Sakamoto gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Sendai at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 38, Sendai have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Cerezo's Hiroaki Okuno gets in a shot on goal at Yanmar Stadium Nagai. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
In the minute 42, Cerezo are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Cerezo.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Sendai.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Koji Hachisuka (Sendai) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Great play from Takuma Hamasaki to set up the goal.
The second half has started at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Sendai needs to be cautious. Cerezo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 46, Free kick Cerezo.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Sendai just outside Cerezo's area.
In the minute 47, At Yanmar Stadium Nagai, Hiroshi Kiyotake has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Sendai are pushing forward but Keiya Shiihashi's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
In the minute 55, Cerezo are coming forward and Riku Matsuda gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Yudai Yamamoto awards Sendai a goal kick.
Yudai Yamamoto awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 56, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Throw-in Sendai.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
In the minute 60, Tatsuhiro Sakamoto scores to make it 2-1 at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Cerezo make their second substitution with Eiichi Katayama replacing Yusuke Maruhashi.
Yoichiro Kakitani is replacing Hiroshi Kiyotake for the home team.
In the minute 62, Koji Suzuki is on a sub for Hiroaki Okuno for Cerezo.
The away team have replaced Takumi Mase with Alexandre Guedes. This is the first substitution made today by Takashi Kiyama.
Takayoshi Ishihara is replacing Takuma Nishimura for Sendai at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Sendai close to the penalty box.
Sendai's Shun Nagasawa misses with an attempt on goal.
Yudai Yamamoto awards Cerezo a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Can Cerezo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sendai's half?
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 69, Takashi Kiyama (Sendai) is making a third substitution, with Shuhei Akasaki replacing Shun Nagasawa.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 71, Cerezo's Leandro Desabato breaks free at Yanmar Stadium Nagai. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Sendai at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
In the minute 74, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Cerezo.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a throw-in for Cerezo, close to Sendai's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Sendai in Osaka.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a Cerezo throw-in in Sendai's half.
In the minute 76, Miguel Angel Lotina is making the team's fourth substitution at Yanmar Stadium Nagai with Toshiyuki Takagi replacing Bruno Pereira Mendes.
The match at Yanmar Stadium Nagai has been interrupted briefly for a check on Yoichiro Kakitani, who is down injured.
In the minute 80, Yoichiro Kakitani is back on the pitch.
Yudai Yamamoto awards the away team a throw-in.
Sendai will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Cerezo.
In the minute 83, Toshiyuki Takagi (Cerezo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Sendai have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 87, Cerezo have a goal kick.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Sendai.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a Sendai throw-in in Cerezo's half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Throw-in for Cerezo close to the penalty box.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
In Osaka, Cerezo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
The match has come to a close in Osaka. The final score is 2-1.
The away team replace Takahiro Yanagi with Ryutaro Iio.
Miguel Angel Lotina (Cerezo) is making a fifth substitution, with Yasuki Kimoto replacing Naoyuki Fujita.
Yoichiro Kakitani (Cerezo) has received a yellow card from Yudai Yamamoto.
